title: The Coming of darkness
brief_description: Seventh in a series of nine animated films on the history of Western Civilization. Discusses the two world wars and the events in Germany, Italy, China, Japan and Russia which were contributing factors. Contends that both were capitalist wars in which workers were fighting workers. Suitable for lower secondary level.
